hyp: This fact really surprise me since I never tried the wine from Cyprus not have heard about it before, does it just pop up and died in the history or does it just pass the brewery knowledge to other country.I haven’t had a chance to taste Cyprus wine yet nor that I have heard about it but with the reputation of the first wine inventor, I think there should be something that we could expect.what makes it even more interesting is that I though the first one who invent wine should be Greece or France.Wow, Ive never known about Cyprus have old story produce wine in the world.Today, wine continues to play a role in the Cypriot identity.I can tell you this, Cyprus truly is a wine country.Last couple years ago I did a wine tour with my family in Cyprus.Ive never tried Cyprus wine before.The country offers a panorama of wine history that puts itnot in the Old World or New World butin the Ancient World’ of wine.
ref: Cyprus is one of the very first countries inventing wine. Cyprus has a history of producing wine over 5,000 years. Wine is very important to Cypriot. Cyprus has stunning scenery. Cypriot are nice and welcoming. The best time to come to Cyprus is during September. because it’s transitional month of grape harvest. Wine produced in Cyprus has unique flavour. Cyprus is a must-go to wine lovers.
